table_description: Device details including model, status, hardware, and applications.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The type of the device (e.g., android_device).

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The etag identifier for the resource.

columns.name: resourceId
columns.description: Unique resource identifier for the device.

columns.name: deviceId
columns.description: Unique device identifier.

columns.name: model
columns.description: The model of the device.

columns.name: os
columns.description: The operating system running on the device.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of device (e.g., smartphone).

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the device (e.g., active, inactive).

columns.name: hardwareId
columns.description: Hardware identifier of the device.

columns.name: firstSync
columns.description: Timestamp when the device was first synced.

columns.name: lastSync
columns.description: Timestamp when the device was last synced.

columns.name: userAgent
columns.description: The user agent string for the device.

columns.name: serialNumber
columns.description: The serial number of the device.

columns.name: imei
columns.description: IMEI number of the device.

columns.name: meid
columns.description: MEID number of the device.

columns.name: wifiMacAddress
columns.description: MAC address of the device's Wi-Fi.

columns.name: networkOperator
columns.description: The network operator associated with the device.

columns.name: defaultLanguage
columns.description: The default language setting on the device.

columns.name: managedAccountIsOnOwnerProfile
columns.description: Indicates if the managed account is on the owner's profile.

columns.name: deviceCompromisedStatus
columns.description: Status of device compromise (e.g., none, compromised).

columns.name: buildNumber
columns.description: The build number of the device.

columns.name: kernelVersion
columns.description: The kernel version of the device.

columns.name: basebandVersion
columns.description: The baseband version of the device.

columns.name: unknownSourcesStatus
columns.description: Indicates if unknown sources are allowed.

columns.name: developerOptionsStatus
columns.description: Indicates if developer options are enabled.

columns.name: adbStatus
columns.description: Indicates if ADB (Android Debug Bridge) is enabled.

columns.name: supportsWorkProfile
columns.description: Indicates if the device supports work profiles.

columns.name: manufacturer
columns.description: The manufacturer of the device.

columns.name: releaseVersion
columns.description: The release version of the OS.

columns.name: securityPatchLevel
columns.description: The latest security patch level installed on the device.

columns.name: brand
columns.description: The brand name of the device.

columns.name: bootloaderVersion
columns.description: The bootloader version of the device.

columns.name: hardware
columns.description: Hardware name of the device.

columns.name: encryptionStatus
columns.description: Indicates the encryption status of the device.

columns.name: devicePasswordStatus
columns.description: Status of device password (e.g., set, not set).

columns.name: privilege
columns.description: The privilege level of the device.

columns.name: applications
columns.description: List of installed applications on the device.
